definition: to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The properties of environmental stress cracking resistance (ESCR) of HDPE were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對HDPE的耐環境應力開裂性能進行了研究。

sentences.english: A high-resolution CT scan can also be performed to look at the temporal bones for dehiscence.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨率的CT檢查也能用於檢查顳骨是否開裂。

sentences.english: Capsule dehiscing loculicidally or septicidally , rarely fruit fleshy and indehiscent.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向開裂或者室間開裂，很少爲肉質和不裂的果。

sentences.english: Capsule dehiscing loculicidally or septicidally , rarely fruit fleshy and indehiscent.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向開裂或者室間開裂，很少爲肉質和不裂的果。

sentences.english: Freezing - thawing damage of concretes saturated in bitterns was characterized as cracking caused by salt crystallization swelling.
sentences.chinese: 其凍融破壞特徵是鹽結晶壓導致混凝土膨脹開裂。

sentences.english: Caryopsis (grain) (pl. caryopses) A dry indehiscent fruit, typical of the grasses.
sentences.chinese: 一種不開裂的乾果，是禾本科植物特有的果實類型。

sentences.english: I tasted blood again, gingerly touched my split upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 輕舔開裂的上脣，我又嚐到血腥味。

sentences.english: Face plate is protected by a rubber outer ring that prevents leaking, slippage and cracking.
sentences.chinese: 臉板保護橡膠外圈，防止泄漏，滑移和開裂。

sentences.english: One and hale year later, cracks appeared on the northern wall at the east end of the building.
sentences.chinese: 加層使用一年半後就發現東頭北面牆體開裂。

sentences.english: Lining cracks will affect the bearing capacity and the safety of tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 隧道襯砌開裂將影響隧道的承載能力和使用安全。

sentences.english: The log would be sprung easily without paint.
sentences.chinese: 圓材不塗漆使用很容易開裂。

sentences.english: Differential settlement and wall cracking occured at two resident buildings of Xiantan University.
sentences.chinese: 湘潭大學有兩棟住宅樓發生不均勻沉降及牆體開裂。

sentences.english: They result in severe cracking which is always ugly .
sentences.chinese: 這會導致構件嚴重開裂，開裂總會有礙觀瞻。

sentences.english: They result in severe cracking which is always ugly .
sentences.chinese: 這會導致構件嚴重開裂，開裂總會有礙觀瞻。

sentences.english: Non-tension method and smeared crack model is applied to the analysis of concrete cracking.
sentences.chinese: 引入無拉力法和彌散裂縫分析混凝土開裂。

sentences.english: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentences.chinese: 在惡劣的條件下，皮膚可能會開裂並流膿。
